metadata.name: Pottery Master #1
metadata.description:
Pottery is a profession that is on the verge of extinction today. There aren't many pottery master left. I took this photo in 2018 in Nevsehir Turkey.  I hope he will transfer this beautiful profession and talent to the next generations in the best way possible. I won 3 gold medals in international photography competitions with this photo.
6720 x 4480 px 
240 dpi
